General.Name: Yotrio Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells outdoor furniture products in China, Europe, North and South America, Australia, Africa, and internationally. Its product portfolio includes aluminum and steel products, meshes, wickers, resin wood and wood products, slings, creatop table tops, and glass table tops. The company sells its products under the Das Original, Royal Garden, SunVilla, and Outdoor Essentials brand names. Yotrio Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Linhai, China.
General.Address: No. 1 Qianjiang South Road, Linhai, China, 317004
